Description: Fragment of neck of black-figure painted pottery neck-amphora. Neck: star of eight buds and dots. Shoulder: tongues in compartments. Purple on necking ring and alternate tongues.
Curator's comments: For star, compare CVA British Museum 8 pl. 100.9
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 609,15)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 40)
